description.text:
You're training as $(b;winter)Soul Reaper$() is almost at an end....you require an audience with $(b;winter)the Queen of air and Darkness$()...
As a Mortal it's not recommended to utter $(b;winter)Queen's Mab$() name...
Also you might want to avoid eye contact...
Wisest action would be if I deliver the gift.....the $(spring)gift$()....$(b;autumn)A still beating Zombie Heart$()!
$(b;winter)-Queen Mab was pleased with your gift, as the winter Courts newly appointed Soul Reaper, you require a weapon fit for such position-$()
